languages.text: "Силы постепенно возвращаются ко мне, Лорд-капитан. И я вновь могу контролировать тело и мысли". {n}Кассия прикладывает руку к чуть сияющему {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}артефакту под кожей{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Силы постепенно возвращаются ко мне, Лорд-капитан. И я вновь могу контролировать тело и мысли". {n}Кассия прикладывает руку к чуть сияющему артефакту под кожей.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

languages.text: “我正在慢慢地恢复力量，舰长大人。我已经再次恢复了对身体与思想的掌控。”{n}卡西娅将手放在胸前，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}那件造物在她的皮肤下发出微光{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact glowing faintly under her skin.{/n}

languages.text: «Estoy recuperando mi fuerza gradualmente, Lord Capitán. Y vuelvo a ser dueña de mi cuerpo y mente». {n}Cassia se lleva la mano al artefacto que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}brilla suavemente bajo su piel{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estoy recuperando mi fuerza gradualmente, Lord Capitán. Y vuelvo a ser dueña de mi cuerpo y mente». {n}Cassia se lleva la mano al artefacto que brilla suavemente bajo su piel.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私は徐々に力を取り戻しています。そして、再び心身をコントロールできるようになりました」{n}カシアは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}皮膚の下で、かすかに光る{/d}アーティファクトに手を当てる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、私は徐々に力を取り戻しています。そして、再び心身をコントロールできるようになりました」{n}カシアは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}皮膚の下で、かすかに光る{/d}アーティファクトに手を当てる。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich gewinne Stück für Stück meine Kraft zurück, Lord Captain. Und ich habe wieder die Kontrolle über meinen Körper und meinen Verstand." {n}Cassia legt ihre Hand auf das Artefakt, das {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}schwach unter ihrer Haut schimmert{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich gewinne Stück für Stück meine Kraft zurück, Lord Captain. Und ich habe wieder die Kontrolle über meinen Körper und meinen Verstand." {n}Cassia legt ihre Hand auf das Artefakt, das schwach unter ihrer Haut schimmert.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je reprends progressivement des forces, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je contrôle de nouveau mon corps et mon esprit. » {n}Cassia pose une main sur l'artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}qui brille faiblement sous sa peau{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am gradually regaining my strength, Lord Captain. And I am in control of my body and mind once again." {n}Cassia puts her hand on the artefact {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}glowing faintly under her skin{/d}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je reprends progressivement des forces, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je contrôle de nouveau mon corps et mon esprit. » {n}Cassia pose une main sur l'artefact qui brille faiblement sous sa peau.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gitgide kuvvetimi geri kazanıyorum Lord Kaptan. Ayrıca bedenime ve aklıma yeniden hâkimim." {n}Cassia, elini {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_CassiaAmuletLeft}cildinin altında hafifçe parlayan{/d} esere götürüyor.{/n}
